name: TableColumnContent
desc: Conforming types represent columns used within a table.

items.name: var tableColumnBody: Self.TableColumnBody
items.desc: The composition of content that comprise the table column content.

items.name: associatedtype TableColumnBody : TableColumnContent
items.desc: The type of content representing the body of this table column content.

items.name: associatedtype TableRowValue : Identifiable = Self.TableColumnBody.TableRowValue
items.desc: The type of value of rows that can be presented by this column content.

items.name: associatedtype TableColumnSortComparator : SortComparator = Self.TableColumnBody.TableColumnSortComparator
items.desc: The type of sort comparator associated with this table column content.
